net.rubygrapefruit.platform

Interface PosixFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NativeIntegration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPosixFile

    public interface PosixFile
extends NativeIntegration
    Functions to query and modify a file's POSIX meta-data.
